project_description: A simple Flutter app that toggles between displaying a cat and a dog with respective icons on a screen.
architecture_overview: The app follows the Cubit pattern for state management, separating concerns into different layers for UI, state management, and data models.

state_management_flow: The state is managed using AnimalCubit. When the user taps on the screen, AnimalCubit toggles the state between cat and dog, which is then reflected on the screen.
navigation_flow: The app has a single screen, so there is no navigation structure beyond the initial MaterialApp setup.
